vsParam:
Ayesha, have you heard of it!?
It's said that a ghost has been seen!

Yes. I hear that it has caused a big mess.
To be honest, I didn't expect to see a ghost in this world...

It's not what I meant! Ayesha, you told us about
the "Glowing Flower" and your younger sister, right?
But we don't know if they are related...

It's alright. Thank you, guys.
Thank you for telling me that!

This whole thing may not be caused by the ghost.
... Is this what you mean?

Yes. If the place happens to have the "Glowing Flower",
Ayesha's younger sister might be there!

Ayesha, let's go find it out!
Hurry up. Let's go!

Ouch, don't push me, Peppermint!
But you guys are right. Let's find it out soon!

Is this thing the ghost?
She seems to be in a lot of pain...

Perhaps she has become an evil spirit and has gone mad.
We need to calm her down...

You mean to beat her up and make her obedient?
She might be Ayesha's younger sister!?

B-but we couldn't communicate with her at all.
Stay alert, guys... Let's do this!

Phew, now she's calmed down...
Well, is this ghost Ayesha's younger sister?

Nope, no.
We got the wrong person...

And we didn't see the "Glowing Flower"...
Sorry, it seems that this is not related to Ayesha's sister.

Hmm... What?
If you want to say something, can you say it to me?

Ah, she disappeared...
But it seemed that she wanted to say something...

Ayesha... i-it doesn't matter. Don't get upset!
We'll find new clues soon!

That's right! So long as you keep investigating the "Glowing Flower",
I'm sure you'll find your younger sister.

Ah, er... guys,
thank you for your support and encouragement.

I'd be lying if I tell you I'm not upset...
But your encouragement has really cheered me up!

Er... did you
discover something else?

Hmm... I only have a hunch...
I'll tell you when I'm sure of it.

Uh? What is it that Ayesha felt... Something related to her
younger sister? Anyway, let's get back to the Academy first!
